document.discussion_title: Non-fiction titles join Galva Library shelves
document.topic_text: Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 10:28 AM Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 10:28 AM GALVA The following non-fiction books have been added to the collection at Galva Library. Brilliant Beacons: A History of the American Lighthouse by Eric Dolin The Genius of Birds by Jennifer Ackerman Diabetes A to Z Mayo Clinic: The Menopause Solution Gardening for Butterflies by Scott Black Dream Home by Jonathan and Drew Scott The Boys in the Boat by Daniel Brown Martha’s Vineyard: Isle of Dreams by Susan Branch The Naturalist: Theodore Roosevelt, a lifetime of exploration by Darrin Lunde Library Hours Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday – 9:30 a.m. to 8 p.m. Thursday – 9:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. Friday – 1 to 5 p.m. Saturday – 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. Galva News - Galva, IL
